articles.title: Scientist Srinivas Kulkarni honoured with 2024 Shaw Prize in astronomy - The Times of India
articles.description: Indian-origin American scientist Srinivas Kulkarni awarded the 2024 Shaw Prize in astronomy for his groundbreaking discoveries on millisecond pulsars, gamma ray bursts, and more. Learn about his contributions to time-domain astronomy and leadership of the Pal…
